product.longDescription: The perfect partner to Cupid, Eros's slightly tapered fruits are the same snack size, avg. 2" x 1 3/4", with a sweet and slightly fruity flavor. The large, sturdy, and leafy plants protect the fruits from sunscald. Bred by Janika Eckert. USDA Certified Organic. Avg. 4,200 seeds/oz. Packet: 25 seeds.
